name: Go! Hamtaro
description:
A fan game in the style of Xonix! Help Hamtaro pass all the levels and destroy the enemies. Unlock new cities and new enemies, create various obstacles to open as much territory as possible. In order to complete the level, you need to open 80% of the space. In the game you will find exciting gameplay and pleasant music.
The game is presented in a demo version with 7 levels. At the moment, the development is suspended due to lack of funding.

Controls: Arrows: left-right-up-down
Keys: ASDW
